message: Let's split fairly, but slightly in my favor considering the inflation disadvantage I have.
Let's split it evenly this time. It's a fair deal, considering the inflation will only affect my share in the next round.
I understand you want an even split, but I need a bit more to compensate for the inflation. This offer is a compromise.
I'm willing to split it evenly again. I think this is the fairest solution, and we can avoid the continuous back-and-forth that's not benefiting either of us.
Bob, we're running out of time.  I'm sticking with my previous offer. It's a reasonable compromise, and any further delay just hurts you more than me.
